item.title: Data Preprocessing and Statistics
item.description:
All the data gathered needs to be processed in ordet to be useful. Take user 38077555’s review: $$	ext{‘ğŸ•°2021
ğŸ’¯88/100 ğŸŒŸ3.8
ğŸ‘Pale pink
ğŸ‘ƒğŸ‘„Slt sweet, strawberry, raspberry, faint English cucumber, fizzy, med acidity, med finish
ğŸ‡Pinot Noir
ğŸ•°ï¸No tech notes available
â›½12.1%ABV
ğŸ’µ$15 MSRP
Wine tasting at local wine shop, second wine
Brought my own wineglass as they serve in stemless generic.
’}$$ Contains emojies that hold little informative value out of context. Furthermore, many reviews are wrongly classified as English. Therefore, reviews containing Cyrilic, Korean, Chinese, or Japanese letters, aswell as the Spanish and (“y”), and Danish letters will be removed to focus only on English reviews.
